message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the interpretation of representations in Deep Neural Networks (DNN) for text classification tasks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a novel method for visualizing hidden layer dynamics, which involves machine learning techniques such as Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and layerwise explanations. Hence, it could also be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper uses experimental results to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method, which could also fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
